data.Name: Berenise Reyes-Albino
data.staff_bio: Berenise Reyes-Albino is the Events Coordinator for the Institute for Community Inclusion (ICI). She has been with the organization for more than 20 years during which she held various positions including Administrative Supervisor and Assistant to the Resource and Finance Manager. Events Coordinator since 2005, she provides expertise and assistance with planning and implementing conferences, trainings, and other events.  She organizes events from the point of identification to completion, including negotiations with hotels and meeting managers in venues where ICI events are scheduled.
